Great torrent!!! Thank you, but I can't create a game. I wanted to play by LAN. How can I play? Please help me guys

to duugii_hi
Type in console: map "map name" "game type" (available types: scavenge, versus, coop, survival) without quotes.
Example: map c11m1_greenhouse versus
